channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: South Sudan "on the brink" UN warns amid renewed violence
item.description: The worlds youngest country teetering on the brink of another conflict and the possibility of regional war.

item.title: New Hampshire town elections offer a preview of citizenship voting rules being considered nationwide
item.description: New Hampshire has tested out its new law requiring people to show proof of citizenship before registering to vote.

item.title: Valve removes video game demo suspected of being malware
item.description: Valve removed a video game called Sniper: Phantom's Resolution from Steam after users reported that its free demo contained malware.
